title: Game Design
description: Emphasis is on the design elements common to games and the expressive possibilities and cultural concerns specific to digital games.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CS 1322 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1331 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (LMC 2700 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2000 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
